body:
There is some confusion here: what you are trying to do is Serialize (write as json) not Deserialize. I will fix the title.

But aside from that, yes, does look like some handling may be missing.
Thank you for reporting the issue.
cc @JooHyukKim  -- date/time issue if you are interested :)

repository.name: jackson-datatype-joda
repository.description: Extension module to properly support full datatype set of Joda datetime library

body:
@bestbugwriter Could you open another issue regarding those?
Implementation should be simliar to #161, best if you could implement serializer for the missing ones as well, but I will try to do it when I find time.

> [@bestbugwriter](https://github.com/bestbugwriter)您能针对这些问题再开一个问题吗？实现方式应该与[#161](https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-datatype-joda/pull/161) 类似，最好能为缺失的那些也实现序列化器，不过我会在有时间的时候尝试这样做。[](https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-datatype-joda/pull/161)

ok  https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-datatype-joda/issues/162

issue.title: Cannot serialize `org.joda.time.Hours`/`Minutes`/`Seconds`/`Months`/`Years`/`Weeks`

repository.name: jackson-datatype-joda
repository.description: Extension module to properly support full datatype set of Joda datetime library

body: @bestbugwriter Like @JooHyukKim said, we do need issues to add support for types with missing support. Looks like you already did that, thanks!
